messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Enigmatic Elm Enigma DATE: 10/10/10 The courtroom was alive with rigorous argumentation as the trial unfolded. The defense presented the officers central to the investigation to shed light on their experiences. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Lieutenant A. B. Adams, the head investigator in this case. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you, Lieutenant Adams. Can you recount the events on the day the enigma was uncovered? WITNESS: Indeed. On the morning of June 6th, Officer C. D. Davis discovered an enigmatic scene at the Elm area and notified the authorities. The investigation was kickstarted immediately. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who was designated for evidence analysis? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Ford and Technician G. H. Harris were tasked with the analysis of the evidence collected. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Who handled the suspect interrogations? WITNESS: Detective I. J. Johnson and Detective K. L. King directed the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses. DEFENSE ATTORNEY: Thank you. No further inquiries. The Prosecution delved into a thorough cross-examination of Lieutenant Adams regarding the investigative procedures. During the trial, Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson, Patrol Officer O. P. Parker, and Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts were also called to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lieutenant A. B. Adams 
Officer Context: Lieutenant Adams is the head investigator in the Enigmatic Elm Enigma case, recounting the events on the day the enigma was uncovered during the trial. 
Officer Role: Lieutenant 

Officer Name: Officer C. D. Davis 
Officer Context: Officer Davis discovered an enigmatic scene at the Elm area on the morning of June 6th, which initiated the investigation. 
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Sergeant E. F. Ford 
Officer Context: Sergeant Ford, along with Technician G. H. Harris, was designated for the analysis of the evidence collected related to the case. 
Officer Role: Sergeant 

Officer Name: Technician G. H. Harris 
Officer Context: Technician Harris worked with Sergeant E. F. Ford on analyzing the evidence concerning the enigmatic scene at the Elm area. 
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. Johnson 
Officer Context: Detective Johnson, alongside Detective K. L. King, handled the interrogations of suspects and potential witnesses to gather more information regarding the enigma. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective K. L. King 
Officer Context: Detective King, along with Detective I. J. Johnson, directed the interrogations to collect additional information about the incident. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer M. N. Nelson 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Nelson was summoned to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer O. P. Parker 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Parker was also called to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer 

Officer Name: Patrol Officer Q. R. Roberts 
Officer Context: Patrol Officer Roberts was brought to testify during the trial, although their specific role in the investigation was not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officer
